creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
build.xml in 1.6 (which doesn't exist in the version drop-down box in 
Bugzilla, BTW), hardcodes the javadoc sets to link to.  Here's a patch that 
makes them configurable and additionally links to JDK 1.4 docs which contains 
also the DOM APIs, as well as Rhino javadocs.

creator: ville.skytta@iki.fi
text:
Created attachment 15854
Make crosslinked javadoc sets configurable
